short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the ability to conveniently add multiple related tags to a Cohost post.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In the options page for this extension, you can add keys and values. Keys correspond to tags that you will manually enter, and values correspond to tags that will automatically be added by the extension when creating or editing posts.
